snippet: The chief executive of Frontier Airlines, David Siegel, has resigned for personal reasons and been replaced by the carrier’s chairman and president.
abstract: Frontier Airlines announces resignation of chief executive David Siegel, for personal reasons.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Frontier Airlines, David Siegel, has resigned for personal reasons and been replaced by the carrier’s chairman and president.

headline.main: Frontier Airlines Chief Is Out After Complaints
headline.print_headline: Frontier Airlines Chief Is Out After Spate of Complaints
